greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. Product_{i>0} Sum_{j=0..k} x^(j*i)/j!.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,
seq(seq(A(n, d-n), n=0..d), d=0..12);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 02 2017
mathematica: Table[Table[A[n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 06 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 01 2017
